Let me create a new animated logo component:

---

Error calling tool 'edit_file'.

---

Let's try a smaller iteration:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import {motion} from 'framer-motion'
+ import Image from 'next/image'
+ 
+ export const AnimatedLogo = () => {
+   // Circle animation variants
+   const circleVariants = {
+     initial: {scale: 0, opacity: 0},
+     animate: {
+       scale: 1,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.8,
+         ease: 'easeOut',
+       },
+     },
+     hover: {
+       scale: 1.05,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.3,
+         ease: 'easeInOut',
+       },
+     },
+   }
+ 
+   // Path animation variants
+   const pathVariants = {
+     initial: {pathLength: 0, opacity: 0},
+     animate: {
+       pathLength: 1,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 1.5,
+         ease: 'easeInOut',
+         delay: 0.5,
+       },
+     },
+   }
+ 
+   // Text animation variants
+   const textVariants = {
+     initial: {y: 20, opacity: 0},
+     animate: (i: number) => ({
+       y: 0,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.5,
+         ease: 'easeOut',
+         delay: 0.8 + i * 0.1,
+       },
+     }),
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.div
+       className='flex flex-col items-center justify-center'
+       initial='initial'
+       animate='animate'
+       whileHover='hover'
+     >
+       <svg
+         width='240'
+         height='180'
+         viewBox='0 0 340 250'
+         xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
+       >
+         {/* Background rectangle */}
+         <motion.rect
+           x='0'
+           y='0'
+           width='100%'
+           height='100%'
+           fill='#fff'
+           initial={{opacity: 0}}
+           animate={{opacity: 1}}
+           transition={{duration: 0.5}}
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Circle background */}
+         <motion.circle
+           cx='150'
+           cy='150'
+           r='30'
+           fill='#444'
+           variants={circleVariants}
+           style={{originX: '50%', originY: '50%'}}
+           transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2)'
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Animated path */}
+         <motion.path
+           d='M1.4 55.7l40.5-40.5c3.6-3.6 8.6-5.8 14.1-5.8 11 0 20 8.9 20 20 0 11-8.9 20-20 20M29.4 7.8c-11 0-20 8.9-20 20v-.4c0 11 8.9 20.3 20 20.3h.6c5.5 0 9.9-2.2 13.5-5.9L84 1.4'
+           fill='none'
+           stroke='#fff'
+           strokeWidth='2'
+           strokeMiterlimit='10'
+           variants={pathVariants}
+           transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2) scale(0.5)'
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Text - COUNTER */}
+         <g transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(0,6.3)'>
+           {['C', 'O', 'U', 'N', 'T', 'E', 'R'].map((letter, i) => (
+             <motion.text
+               key={`counter-${i}`}
+               x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+               y={15.6}
+               fill='#444'
+               fontFamily='sans-serif'
+               fontSize='12'
+               custom={i}
+               variants={textVariants}
+             >
+               {letter}
+             </motion.text>
+           ))}
+         </g>
+ 
+         {/* Text - CULTURE */}
+         <g transform='translate(115.5,110)'>
+           {['C', 'U', 'L', 'T', 'U', 'R', 'E'].map((letter, i) => (
+             <motion.text
+               key={`culture-${i}`}
+               x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+               y={15.6}
+               fill='#444'
+               fontFamily='sans-serif'
+               fontSize='12'
+               custom={i}
+               variants={textVariants}
+             >
+               {letter}
+             </motion.text>
+           ))}
+         </g>
+       </svg>
+     </motion.div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
```

Now let's create a demo page to showcase the animated logo:

```diff
- 
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import {AnimatedLogo} from '@/components/AnimatedLogo'
+ 
+ export default function LogoDemoPage() {
+   return (
+     <div className='flex flex-col items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-50'>
+       <h1 className='text-3xl font-bold mb-8'>Animated Logo Demo</h1>
+       <div className='p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg'>
+         <AnimatedLogo />
+       </div>
+       <p className='mt-8 text-gray-600'>
+         Animated with Framer Motion - Hover over the logo to see additional
+         effects
+       </p>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
```

---

Let's create a more advanced version of the animated logo that better utilizes Framer Motion's capabilities:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import {useState} from 'react'
+ import {motion, useAnimationControls, AnimatePresence} from 'framer-motion'
+ 
+ export const AnimatedLogoAdvanced = () => {
+   const [isHovered, setIsHovered] = useState(false)
+   const controls = useAnimationControls()
+ 
+   const handleHoverStart = () => {
+     setIsHovered(true)
+     controls.start('hover')
+   }
+ 
+   const handleHoverEnd = () => {
+     setIsHovered(false)
+     controls.start('animate')
+   }
+ 
+   // Circle animation variants
+   const circleVariants = {
+     initial: {scale: 0, opacity: 0},
+     animate: {
+       scale: 1,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.8,
+         ease: 'easeOut',
+       },
+     },
+     hover: {
+       scale: 1.05,
+       fill: '#2563eb', // Change color on hover
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.3,
+         ease: 'easeInOut',
+       },
+     },
+   }
+ 
+   // Path animation variants
+   const pathVariants = {
+     initial: {pathLength: 0, opacity: 0},
+     animate: {
+       pathLength: 1,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 1.5,
+         ease: 'easeInOut',
+         delay: 0.5,
+       },
+     },
+     hover: {
+       stroke: '#ffffff',
+       strokeWidth: 3,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.3,
+       },
+     },
+   }
+ 
+   // Text animation variants
+   const textContainerVariants = {
+     animate: {
+       transition: {
+         staggerChildren: 0.1,
+         delayChildren: 0.8,
+       },
+     },
+   }
+ 
+   const textItemVariants = {
+     initial: {y: 20, opacity: 0},
+     animate: {
+       y: 0,
+       opacity: 1,
+       transition: {
+         duration: 0.5,
+         ease: 'easeOut',
+       },
+     },
+     hover: (i: number) => ({
+       y: [0, -10, 0],
+       color: '#2563eb',
+       transition: {
+         y: {
+           duration: 0.5,
+           times: [0, 0.5, 1],
+           ease: 'easeInOut',
+           delay: i * 0.05,
+         },
+         color: {
+           duration: 0.3,
+         },
+       },
+     }),
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.div
+       className='flex flex-col items-center justify-center cursor-pointer'
+       initial='initial'
+       animate='animate'
+       onHoverStart={handleHoverStart}
+       onHoverEnd={handleHoverEnd}
+     >
+       <svg
+         width='240'
+         height='180'
+         viewBox='0 0 340 250'
+         xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
+         className='overflow-visible'
+       >
+         {/* Background rectangle */}
+         <motion.rect
+           x='0'
+           y='0'
+           width='100%'
+           height='100%'
+           fill='#fff'
+           initial={{opacity: 0}}
+           animate={{opacity: 1}}
+           transition={{duration: 0.5}}
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Circle background */}
+         <motion.circle
+           cx='150'
+           cy='150'
+           r='30'
+           fill='#444'
+           variants={circleVariants}
+           animate={controls}
+           style={{originX: '50%', originY: '50%'}}
+           transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2)'
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Animated path */}
+         <motion.path
+           d='M1.4 55.7l40.5-40.5c3.6-3.6 8.6-5.8 14.1-5.8 11 0 20 8.9 20 20 0 11-8.9 20-20 20M29.4 7.8c-11 0-20 8.9-20 20v-.4c0 11 8.9 20.3 20 20.3h.6c5.5 0 9.9-2.2 13.5-5.9L84 1.4'
+           fill='none'
+           stroke='#fff'
+           strokeWidth='2'
+           strokeMiterlimit='10'
+           variants={pathVariants}
+           animate={controls}
+           transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2) scale(0.5)'
+         />
+ 
+         {/* Text - COUNTER */}
+         <motion.g
+           transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(0,6.3)'
+           variants={textContainerVariants}
+           animate={controls}
+         >
+           {['C', 'O', 'U', 'N', 'T', 'E', 'R'].map((letter, i) => (
+             <motion.text
+               key={`counter-${i}`}
+               x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+               y={15.6}
+               fill='#444'
+               fontFamily='sans-serif'
+               fontSize='12'
+               custom={i}
+               variants={textItemVariants}
+               animate={controls}
+             >
+               {letter}
+             </motion.text>
+           ))}
+         </motion.g>
+ 
+         {/* Text - CULTURE */}
+         <motion.g
+           transform='translate(115.5,110)'
+           variants={textContainerVariants}
+           animate={controls}
+         >
+           {['C', 'U', 'L', 'T', 'U', 'R', 'E'].map((letter, i) => (
+             <motion.text
+               key={`culture-${i}`}
+               x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+               y={15.6}
+               fill='#444'
+               fontFamily='sans-serif'
+               fontSize='12'
+               custom={i + 7} // Offset to stagger after COUNTER
+               variants={textItemVariants}
+               animate={controls}
+             >
+               {letter}
+             </motion.text>
+           ))}
+         </motion.g>
+ 
+         {/* Interactive pulse animation on hover */}
+         <AnimatePresence>
+           {isHovered && (
+             <motion.circle
+               cx='150'
+               cy='150'
+               r='30'
+               stroke='#2563eb'
+               strokeWidth='2'
+               fill='transparent'
+               transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2)'
+               initial={{scale: 1, opacity: 0}}
+               animate={{
+                 scale: 1.5,
+                 opacity: [0, 0.5, 0],
+                 transition: {
+                   duration: 1.5,
+                   repeat: Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY,
+                   ease: 'easeInOut',
+                 },
+               }}
+               exit={{opacity: 0, scale: 1}}
+             />
+           )}
+         </AnimatePresence>
+       </svg>
+     </motion.div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
```

```diff
+           <li>Interactive pulse effect (advanced version)</li>

-         effects
-       </p>
      </div>
    )
```

---

Let's create a third version of the logo that showcases scroll-linked animations by using Framer Motion's scroll features:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client'
+ 
+ import {useRef} from 'react'
+ import {motion, useScroll, useTransform} from 'framer-motion'
+ 
+ export const AnimatedLogoScroll = () => {
+   const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null)
+ 
+   // Use scroll values to drive animations
+   const {scrollYProgress} = useScroll({
+     target: containerRef,
+     offset: ['start end', 'end start'],
+   })
+ 
+   // Transform scroll progress into usable animation values
+   const scale = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.5, 1], [0.8, 1.2, 1])
+   const rotate = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.5, 1], [0, 180, 360])
+   const pathLength = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.3], [0, 1])
+   const opacity = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.2, 0.8, 1], [0, 1, 1, 0])
+   const textY = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0, 0.5], [20, 0])
+   const textOpacity = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0.1, 0.3], [0, 1])
+   const circleColor = useTransform(
+     scrollYProgress,
+     [0, 0.3, 0.6, 1],
+     ['#444444', '#2563eb', '#9333ea', '#444444']
+   )
+ 
+   return (
+     <div
+       ref={containerRef}
+       className='h-[100vh] flex flex-col items-center justify-center'
+     >
+       <motion.div
+         className='flex flex-col items-center justify-center'
+         style={{
+           scale,
+           opacity,
+         }}
+       >
+         <motion.svg
+           width='240'
+           height='180'
+           viewBox='0 0 340 250'
+           xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
+           style={{rotate}}
+         >
+           {/* Background rectangle */}
+           <motion.rect x='0' y='0' width='100%' height='100%' fill='#fff' />
+ 
+           {/* Circle background */}
+           <motion.circle
+             cx='150'
+             cy='150'
+             r='30'
+             style={{fill: circleColor}}
+             transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2)'
+           />
+ 
+           {/* Animated path */}
+           <motion.path
+             d='M1.4 55.7l40.5-40.5c3.6-3.6 8.6-5.8 14.1-5.8 11 0 20 8.9 20 20 0 11-8.9 20-20 20M29.4 7.8c-11 0-20 8.9-20 20v-.4c0 11 8.9 20.3 20 20.3h.6c5.5 0 9.9-2.2 13.5-5.9L84 1.4'
+             fill='none'
+             stroke='#fff'
+             strokeWidth='2'
+             strokeMiterlimit='10'
+             style={{pathLength}}
+             transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(84.1,0) translate(14.2,14.2) scale(0.5)'
+           />
+ 
+           {/* Text - COUNTER */}
+           <motion.g
+             transform='translate(75.8,103.7) translate(0,6.3)'
+             style={{y: textY, opacity: textOpacity}}
+           >
+             {['C', 'O', 'U', 'N', 'T', 'E', 'R'].map((letter, i) => (
+               <motion.text
+                 key={`counter-${i}`}
+                 x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+                 y={15.6}
+                 fill='#444'
+                 fontFamily='sans-serif'
+                 fontSize='12'
+               >
+                 {letter}
+               </motion.text>
+             ))}
+           </motion.g>
+ 
+           {/* Text - CULTURE */}
+           <motion.g
+             transform='translate(115.5,110)'
+             style={{y: textY, opacity: textOpacity}}
+           >
+             {['C', 'U', 'L', 'T', 'U', 'R', 'E'].map((letter, i) => (
+               <motion.text
+                 key={`culture-${i}`}
+                 x={i * 10 - 1.3}
+                 y={15.6}
+                 fill='#444'
+                 fontFamily='sans-serif'
+                 fontSize='12'
+               >
+                 {letter}
+               </motion.text>
+             ))}
+           </motion.g>
+         </motion.svg>
+ 
+         <motion.div
+           className='text-center mt-8'
+           style={{y: textY, opacity: textOpacity}}
+         >
+           <p className='text-lg font-medium'>Scroll-Linked Animation</p>
+           <p className='text-sm text-gray-600 mt-2'>
+             The animation responds to your scroll position
+           </p>
+         </motion.div>
+       </motion.div>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
```

---

```diff
+               viewport position.
+             </p>
+           </div>

        </div>
      </div>
```

---

The animated logo components are now created. Here's what I've implemented for you:

1. **Standard Animated Logo** (`AnimatedLogo.tsx`):
   - Basic entrance animations for different parts of the logo
   - Simple hover effects
   - SVG path drawing animation
   - Staggered text animations

2. **Advanced Animated Logo** (`AnimatedLogoAdvanced.tsx`):
   - Interactive hover animations with color changes
   - Pulse effect when hovering
   - More complex choreographed animations
   - Staggered letter animations with individual timing
   - Uses `AnimatePresence` for smooth transitions

3. **Scroll-Linked Animated Logo** (`AnimatedLogoScroll.tsx`):
   - Animations linked directly to scroll position
   - Color transitions based on scroll progress
   - Rotation and scale effects that respond to scrolling
   - Path drawing animation tied to scroll position

4. **Demo Page** (`src/app/logo-demo/page.tsx`):
   - Showcases all three logo animation variations
   - Provides explanations of the animation features
   - Responsive layout for different screen sizes

You can access the demo page at `/logo-demo` to see all the animations in action. The scroll-linked animation is especially engaging as it responds directly to your scrolling behavior.

---
